c55d411d-2a52-4e53-af21-62e7f8f6147c.name: Solar Power Subsystem
c55d411d-2a52-4e53-af21-62e7f8f6147c.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on high efficiency.

embodiment.principle: High-Efficiency Photovoltaic Panels with Advanced Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses high-efficiency, flexible solar panels and lithium-ion batteries for better energy storage and management.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.22 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.22 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

c55d411d-2a52-4e53-af21-62e7f8f6147c.verification_plan: Test under varying solar conditions to ensure energy output meets requirements.

0a0c7b5a-19b4-4c4e-9d70-6d4109a4b809.name: Filtration Subsystem
0a0c7b5a-19b4-4c4e-9d70-6d4109a4b809.description: Removes contaminants from raw water to produce potable water with high efficiency.

embodiment.principle: Advanced Ceramic Water Filter with Pre-Treatment
embodiment.description: Utilizes a high-efficiency ceramic filter with additional pre-treatment stages for improved contaminant removal.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

0a0c7b5a-19b4-4c4e-9d70-6d4109a4b809.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency under various contaminant loads.

6d027078-0bcc-48a3-be4e-66dd77e43760.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
6d027078-0bcc-48a3-be4e-66dd77e43760.description: Monitors and displays water quality parameters with high accuracy.

embodiment.description: Incorporates high-accuracy sensors for pH, turbidity, TDS, and additional parameters like conductivity and temperature.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

6d027078-0bcc-48a3-be4e-66dd77e43760.verification_plan: Test sensor accuracy and response time under various conditions.

9d7fbead-c81a-4ec7-842e-1dcbd74c2af8.name: Power Management Subsystem
9d7fbead-c81a-4ec7-842e-1dcbd74c2af8.description: Manages and optimizes power distribution and storage with advanced features.

embodiment.principle: Smart Charge Controller with Advanced Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a smart charge controller with real-time monitoring and adaptive battery management.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

9d7fbead-c81a-4ec7-842e-1dcbd74c2af8.verification_plan: Test power management under varying loads and conditions.
